full_title_en: IMPROVE RAM (International Medical Prevention Registry on Venous Thromboembolism Risk Assessment Model)

seo.meta_description_en: The IMPROVE RAM (International Medical Prevention Registry on Venous Thromboembolism Risk Assessment Model) estimates risk of VTE.
seo.keywords_en: IMPROVE RAM, VTE RAM, VTE Risk, vte risk score, vte risk calc, vte risk factor, prognosis vte, DVT Risk, DVT risk score, DVT risk calc, DVT risk factor, prognosis DVT, PE Risk, PE risk score, PE risk calc, PE risk factor, prognosis PE, international medical prevention registry, prevention vte, prevention registry

about.formula_en:
Addition of selected points.

Risk Factors Associated With the IMPROVE RAM Score Points Added
Previous VTE +3
Known thrombophilia +2
Lower limb paralysis +2
Cancer +2
Immobilization +1
Intensive care unit or coronary care unit stay +1
Age >60 years +1
about.more_info_en:
Score interpretation:

IMPROVE RAM Score Risk Group
≤ 2 Low risk of venous thromboembolism (VTE)
≥ 3 At risk of VTE

Epub 2007 Jun 15. PubMed PMID: 17573514.

J Am Heart Assoc. 2014 Nov 17;3(6):e001152. doi: 10.1161/JAHA.114.001152. PubMed PMID: 25404191; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4338701.

creator_info.about_en: Victor Tapson, MD, is a pulmonologist at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles. He is currently the director of the Venous Thromboembolism and Pulmonary Vascular Disease Program and the director of clinical research at the Women's Guild Lung Institute.
